title: How to write a sick leave application for two days to class - Quora

response.answer_text: How to write a sick leave application for two days. This is a sample (draft) sick leave application for your reference. (Date) To, The Principal/Headmaster/Class Teacher (School name and address) Subject: Application for leave of absence. Sir/ma'am, I am (your name), student of class (Your class and division). With due respect, I would like to inform you that I will not be able to attend school from xx-xx-xxxx to xx-xx-xxxx (mention the period you will be absent) due to high fever / cold / stomachache / headache / viral infection. The doctor has advised me to take bed rest for two days. I am enclosing doctor's note for your perusal and record. Therefore, I request you to kindly grant me a leave of absence for those days. Thanking you. Yours obediently (Your name) Class - (standard and division) Roll No: (your roll no.)  I hope this answer is helpful to you. Thank you.

To The principal XYZ School (School Small Address + district) Date: 8th April 2019 Subject: Application from sick leave. Respected Sir, Respectfully, I am here to inform you that, I am suffering from fever since last night. The doctor had advised me to take 4 days rest. I, therefore, request you to grand me 4 days leave from 08/04/2019 to 11/04/2019. Thanking you! Yours obediently Name ________ Roll no. ______ Class : _______ Section : _______

In a formal form of letter writing, you have to keep in mind that it is short, crisp, to the point, courteous and has all the important info too…So here is the best one To The Principal [Name of the Organisation] Example : Army Public School [City] SUBJECT: Application for sickness leave Respected Sir/Ma'am, With due respect this is to inform you that I [YOUR NAME] of [CLASS-SECTION] am suffering from [AILMENT] due to which I Would not be able to come to school for two days. I shall be highly obliged if you could please grant me the leave. Thanking you, Yours faithfully [YOUR SIGNATURE] FULL NAME CLASS-SECTION DATE

I found a nice sample letter on the web you can customize. I hope this gives you ideas on how to construct your own letter: Your NameTitleOrganizationAddressCity, State Zip Code Date: Contact NameTitleOrganizationAddressCity, State Zip Code Dear Mr. Last name, Please accept this letter as documentation of my absence from March 2 through March 6, 2018, because of sickness. I have included my doctor’s note detailing his recommendation for hospital treatment because of complications from the flu. I have also enclosed the hospital discharge instructions. If I can provide any additional information, please let me know. Thank you for your understanding. Sincerely, Your Signature (hard copy letter) Your Typed Name
Kindly, accept my apology following my sickness. I will report in two days time. Your faithfully
Hold your pen by using your hand on the paper and start writing.
